author: remm
msg: - Code cleanups
- Updated my email in the source
- Head method is now extending Get, instead of duplicating the code
- Fixed the destination header for Copy and Move
- Removed two uneeded files

author: remm
msg: - Collection browser in the DAV servlet (based on some Catalina and
Tomcat code)
- HTTP/1.1 headers support (should allow resuming, all types of conditional
requests, multipart requests, ETags, ...)
- Lock checking are back in the core
- Added a new easier to use lockCheck method in the lock helper
- Fixes for the handling of Dates in NodeRevisionDescriptor and in the DAV
servlet
- Updated the status.xml page regarding the current progress

author: remm
msg: - Doc fixes
- Fix for a date format problem
- Fix the documentation samples

author: remm
msg: - Updates to the documentation
- Enhanced default configuration in the web application

author: remm
msg: - Modified a bit the way the slide.war web app archive is being
built. The included Domain.xml still needs more work, since (IMO)
it should showcase as many config options as possible. Same
goes with the included web.xml file.
